Your all-access ticket to a year of unforgettable performances.

The 2025 Season Pass grants you entry to all Horizon Playhouse mainstage productions throughout the season — including original premieres, classic revivals, and community favorites. Whether you're a longtime supporter or discovering our theater for the first time, this pass guarantees you a front-row seat to stories that move, entertain, and connect.

What’s included:

✅ Admission to all mainstage performances in the 2025 season

✅ Free ticket exchanges (up to 48 hours before the show)

✅ Exclusive invites to open rehearsals and post-show talkbacks
